text: Zeeboids is an application that allows avatars to be created. It was developed by Zeebo Interactive Studios in Brazil, and was only released for the Zeebo. Zeeboids works with Zeebo Football Club (F.C.) games such as Zeebo F.C. Foot Camp, allowing players to create custom characters ("avatars") and participate in online rankings. ==Creating Zeeboids== Zeeboids has 24 options for customizing the look of the characters, including skin, physique, hairstyles, 12 different uniforms, and more. It keeps track of and rewards avatar accomplishments, allows players to upload scores, take part in online rankings and use their avatars on each other's Zeebo systems. ==Compatible games== Title Developer Publisher Release date Genre Zeebo F.C. Foot Camp Zeebo Interactive Studios Zeebo Inc. June 2, 2010 Sports Zeebo F.C. Super Liga Zeebo Interactive Studios Zeebo Inc. December 22, 2010 Sports ==Online Tournament in Brazil== From June 11, 2010, during the 2010 FIFA World Cup, Zeebo Brazil held an online tournament for players with Foot Camp and Zeeboids. The top scorers in each of the four mini-games, as well as those with the best overall combined scores, earned free Z-Credits. ==Related pages== * Avatar * Mii * PlayStation Home ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Brazilian Website (Brazilian Portuguese) * Official Mexican Website (Spanish) * Official Zeebo Inc.
